TopicTitle: Warp Bug: Planets only move in Tracking Station when Ship is Grounded / At KSC Launch Pad; trying to Warp while in Orbit = No Planetary Movement, Even Though Ship Experiences Warp Around Planet

Articles.Content:
Hey,

It is is mix of a bug with TimeWarp limited in Tracking Station (there has been several bug reports on this issue):

[God, forum search is awful!]

and warp limit in map view - this always behaved like this in KSP1 - you would launch (or build a ship in orbit) at say 650km - to have maximum warp accel available to you once you plot the transfer maneuver

4 hours ago, MehJeb said:

Hey,

It is is mix of a bug with TimeWarp limited in Tracking Station (there has been several bug reports on this issue):

[God, forum search is awful!]

and warp limit in map view - this always behaved like this in KSP1 - you would launch (or build a ship in orbit) at say 650km - to have maximum warp accel available to you once you plot the transfer maneuver

I think it's worse than that.  I'm trying for a Duna Intercept - and the ship warps along the orbital path - but the planet does not move, meaning no Intercept.
